runs.comm: gone! First ball. Perfect start for Australia. Was dropped in short, Porterfield responded with a hook, gets a top edge and it is comfortably taken by long leg
beaten! Hint of movement away from Stirling as he plays forward and it scoots pas the outside edge
angled into the pads, rolls towards square leg
more movement from Watson, nips back into Stirling who defends from the crease getting an inside edge into his pads

close! Mayhem out there. Another short ball, Stirling was advancing down the pitch and tried to pull. The ball lobbed towards square leg and there was nearly a mix-up in the running but Mike Hussey couldn't hit direct
that's more like it...stands tall and drives a length ball on the up over extra cover. That will help settle a few nerves
starts full on leg stump, neatly flicked away backward of square on the leg side
back of a length on off stump, shapes to force it through the off side but doesn't get any timing on the shot
full on the stumps, starts to swing back into Stirling but he responds with a well-timed drive straight to cover
swing on offer for Starc, on a full length and shapes back, driven into the off side
very full, giving the ball every chance to move, Joyce is across his crease and works towards mid-on
outside off stump, Joyce comes onto the front foot and defends square to point
low full toss on the stumps, flicked through straight midwicket and there's man on the boundary

poor line, flicked off leg stump and short fine-leg is inside the circle so deep square has to run around. He can't quite drag it back first of all, then turns and makes a second dive to try and stop it but is just touching the rope at the same time
full on middle and leg, allows Joyce to go through the leg side again and finds deep midwickjet
angling into Stirling as it was from Watson, he just gives himself a little room to drive into the off side and sends it wide of mid-off
outside off stump and the rare sight of one being left alone
back of a length on off stump, defended from the back foot and it rolls towards the slips
pitches outside leg stump, Stirling shapes to heave it over the leg side but is early on his shot and the ball dribbles to leg side
full outside off, Joyce drives but is a little caught on the crease so doesn't get much power behind the shot as it runs to right of mid-off

another catch in the deep, this time at third man. Was a hint of width outside off, Stirling through his hands through a drive and it skewed high down towards Watson who ran around the boundary and held an excellent catch
nicely driven by Joyce but well fielded at cover to keep them to a single
short of a length outside off, nice carry to the keeper as O'Brien pulls his bat inside the line
left alone outside off
full on off stump, tries to get forward and pushes firmly to cover
strong shot by Joyce, drilled from leg stump and it beats mid-on
cracked square of the wicket, superb piece of fielding at backward point from David Warner to prevent the chance of another boundary
dropped in short, was just outside off stump but Joyce has enough to pull it well in front of square through midwicket
gets back on a full length outside off, goes for the drive and the bat turns in his hand which means he loses timing
full on middle and off, defended to the off side
round the wicket, full on off stump, driven to extra cover
Drifts into middle and leg, flicked along the ground in front of square leg
this one is a little slower and a touch shorter, just turns a fraction as it's played square on the off side
fired down the leg side, Joyce goes for the sweep and gets a bottom edge which costs him a wide call
very soft...tossed up on off stump, Joyce tries to go over the top but can only lob his drive straight to mid-off who was inside the circle
round the wicket, full outside and beautifully driven between cover and mid-off...all timing and placement
full on middle and off, bustling medium pace, driven to the covers
width outside off, goes for a booming drive and it comes off an inside edge past the stumps and a diving Matthew Wade
nicely played, outside off again and he whips it through the leg side with a strong bottom hand
beauty! Back of a length and straightens on Wilson to zip past the outside edge. Good carry, too.
short ball, this time and Ireland batsman keeps the pull shot down as he rolls his wrists to find deep square
slash and a miss outside off as he is given some width
over the wicket, full on off stump, Wilson comes onto the front foot and plays to backward point
gone! Another departs. Hogg strikes second ball. It looked pretty good, full on the stumps, straightened a fraction and Wilson was trying to play to leg.
full on leg stump, worked to midwicket
onto the front foot, pushes gently into the covers
swept from around off stump, gets it through short fine-leg but the fielders in the deep are quick
very full outside off, squeezed out square to the off side towards point...Ireland not going anywhere at the moment
this one keeps down a fraction as Kevin is caught on the back foot and gets the bottom of the bat into the leg side
short and wide outside off but it only costs a single as Niall cuts down to third man
that was sharp from Watson. Another bouncer, Kevin went for the pull and there's an appeal from keeper and bowler for a top edge but the umpire not interested
nice piece of timing, punched behind square through the off side from the back foot against a short ball outside off...third man makes a good dive and just manages to haul it back. Good work.
full on the stumps, pushed gently down the ground through mid-on
strangled appeal for lbw as Niall plays across the line of a full delivery but it pitched outside leg stump...still, another economical over for Australia
pushed across the right hander, he goes down early for the sweep and paddles it through fine leg...Cummins fumbles in the deep
nicely bowled, grips off the surface and takes the outside edge which runs to short third-man
full on the stumps, driven back down the pitch
drops a touch short outside off, Kevin onto the back foot and places out to deep cover
swept firmly from off stump through square leg and placed well enough for a second
goes to drive through the off side and it skews off the inside edge into his boot
short outside off, sits up and it's driven firmly through the covers
round the wicket, tossed up slowly, Niall pushes forward and it almost loops back to the bowler
short on leg stump, swept around the corner to short fine-leg
this one doesn't turn, finds the outside edge as Kevin tries to work it away and the ball runs to short third-man
swept strongly from outside off and a rare boundary for Ireland as he picks the gap between deep square and deep midwicket
this time he misses the sweep, Wade whips off the bails but the back foot is firmly planted
uses his feet, but well bowled by Hogg as he drags his length a touch shorter and it's pushed to the leg side
can't get this away as he pushes off the back foot to the off side
tossed up with a hint of width outside off, Kevin drives firmly and it comes off a thick edge fine of short third-man...O'Brien not reading the variations of Hogg
another boundary, a quicker ball outside off which is dragged a touch short and Kevin cuts firmly through the off side to beat deep cover
fuller this time, opens the face square into the off side
turns into Niall which cramps him for room as he tries to find a gap in the off side but it ends up going to point
nearly strikes straight away as Kevin pushes early at a full delivery but Christian can't quite time his leap in the follow through
lovely shot. Classy from Kevin O'Brien as he leans into a full ball and sends it race past a diving mid-off
pulls the length back this time and Kevin blocks
short of a length, nips back into the right hander and takes an inside edge into the pads
full on off stump, comes forward into the drive and picks out cover
short outside off, opens the face and finds deep cover
round the wicket, driven in the air square of the wicket past a diving Brad Hogg at point
full on off stump, heaved down the ground to long-off
latches onto a short ball with a very powerful pull...Kevin saw it early and pulled well in front of square, one bounce over the rope
goes full this time, into the pads, runs into the off side
full at leg stump, Niall gives himself some room and drills it straight down the ground but mid-on is able to run around
cracking shot! Full on the stumps, Kevin just shuffles to leg to open up the off side and plunders it through the off side with a stand-and-deliver drive
that's a bonus boundary, takes the outside edge from Niall as he tries to run to third man...it pitches in front of Wade and takes an awful bounce over his head down. Time for a helmet?
worked to the leg side
that's the end of that. A full ball, perhaps a slower delivery, Niall aims to swing it through the leg side in the slog-sweep position and misses
full on the stumps, worked away in front of square on the leg side
a slower short ball, holds in the surface and Kevin is early on the pull which means he gets taken on the shoulder
big wicket! Excellent over from Watson. A short ball, Kevin tried to upper-cut it down to third man and was a little half-hearted in the short which led to an edge to Wade.
short ball outside off and he pulls through midwicket
outside off, spins away and it's left alone...in the 16th over
a fraction shorter this time, turns into Johnston who has time to work it off the back foot through straight midwicket
quicker ball on leg stump, can't find a gap this time as Hogg fields in his follow through
flicked in the air over midwicket from outside off stump, lands well in front of the deep fielder
full on the stumps, the wrong 'un, and it's worked into the square-leg area
back of a length at the batsman, defended off the back foot to the off side
well played, fuller ball outside off and he drives on the up over the covers with the power to find the boundary
back of a length, angled into Cusack who plays it to White at backward point
waits a fraction long for this time and opens to face down to third man
good effort to make that into a boundary! A short ball angled into Johnston who backs away then manages to ramp it over the keeper. Judgement or luck? It doesn't matter
flicked into the leg side
on target! Perfect yorker from round the wicket, right at the bottom of off stump and hits the target as Johnston tried to give himself room
on a length this time, Jones pushes forward firmly and gets it down to long-off
driven in the air straight down the ground, nearly manges to split long-off and long-on but David Warner is very quick in the outfield
another terrific yorker, at middle and leg, dug out into the off side
nicely played, just a hint of width outside off and driven square with an open face but third man is able to get around
low full toss outside off, driven out to deep cover
slower ball outside off, played square into the off side for scampered single to point
beaten outside off by a full delivery, plays over the top as he tries to send it through the off side
a slower, full, delivery, he picks it up quiet cleanly and it goes one bounce down to long-on
can't get this one through the infield
quite a big full toss, Jones tries to crack it through the off side but can only find over on the edge of the ring
goes over the infield against another full toss, gets some better placement but still not the boundaries Ireland really need
low full toss outside off, driven down to long-off
full and wide outside off, Cusack can't time it very well into the off side as it comes off the bottom of the bat
that's useful...dragged down short and Jones picks it up superbly with a cracking pull which flies over the square-leg boundary. First six of the innings
now he sprays this one wide outside off so Ireland get a bonus delivery
another short ball, risky ploy, but this time Jones can only splice it to midwicket
a bouncer and, quite oddly, Cusack just ducks underneath...was hoping for a wide call
width outside off, swings hard and it flies off a thick edge towards third man who is able to cut off the boundary
